name: HelpDetector
short: Detects help-related messages and directs users to the help channel
description: A cog that monitors messages for help-related keywords and automatically responds with directions to the dedicated help channel. Includes cooldown to prevent spam.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs temporarily for cooldown tracking. This data is not persistent and is cleared when the bot restarts.
author: mrdyl
